name: ForumSpin
short_description: ForumSpin is nearing prototype release. The goal of the prototype release is to generate more of a proof of concept with the end goal of finding 1-2 other developers who may be interested in working on the project further. Once the prototype release is completed work will begin immediately on a functional release with the aim of achieving a functioning beta within a short period of time. The goal is to create a functional real time forum utilizing a combination of PHP and Node.js which creates something which blurs the lines between traditional forums and traditional chat rooms allowing for real time communication between active forum members.
summary: ForumSpin is an spin on the traditional forum.
